name: Go Down (itch)
description:
Game made with @SuckMyElbows for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

In this game you can't go up. If you do you will die so just don't go up. Reach the depths of the world and throw yourself into the abyss! WHAT A GAME!
WASD to move around
Space to jump

R to reset

HAVE FUN!
